thread.section_title: LensDirect Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of LensDirect | lensdirect.com
thread.title: Deborah

author: Deborah
title: Deborah
text: I found Lens Direct to be an excellent company to order from! My customer service rep, Christine, was so wonderful working through my several (incorrect) attempts to order the correct prescription and lens type. Once we got past this, the rest was a piece of cake. Quick delivery and knowledgeable, helpful reps have me sold, and I will definitely re-order when I run out of lenses!
